description: default terminal is broken, so i can use this
حلوة انها تستخدم GTK4 و بسيط شكلها بس ليتها تدعم اللغة العربية
summary: حلوة - العنزي من المملكة العربية السعودية fedora gnome 46

description:
Why do i have to press shift for every command.
I can't just ctl-c,v,x i have to ctl-shift-c,v,x

Who thought that was a good idea?
Simple and easy to use, integrates well with the GNOME desktop and functions very well. Would recommend over gnome-terminal if you are using GNOME.
Nice, unfinished tho. 1. weird process name: kgx. 2. No man entry. 3. No way to --execute a command through it.
For basic use, this terminal emulator it's very good. The integration with GNOME is the best in class and the ui looks clean and fresh. I cannot wait for the libadwaita version =)
Good Console. Like it.

I only use the terminal when I know it's faster or I have to use a command line tool. This is a great terminal app for users like me, as it is cut down to the bare-bones essence of what a terminal should be: a window to interact with your computer through the command line. However, if you spend a lot of the time in your terminal and want extra quality of life / comfort features, you might want to use a more feature-rich terminal application.
follows gnome latest design guidelines. gives me everything i want in a very minimilastic way...

There are no fancy features, but if you want those you already have a favorite terminal emulator. Gets the job done, nothing more. But you're on GNOME, so you probably aren't living in the terminal anyway.
summary: Does what it sets out to

description: It is a very good console application but it can be developed more such as profiles, more customizations and themes. I like it!
Sadly. It even looks more limited than the GTK3 sibling - why not just update that one rather than renaming & rebranding it?
Cool to see a terminal on gtk4. Very pretty.

-Can no longer have a dark terminal without making the window bar dark (not matching every other window)
-Can no longer change cursor bar type
-Can no longer disable bell sound

GNOME found a way to ruin something as basic as a terminal app. Congrats.
Terminal change color when waiting for command to execute. It's nice xd
Missing Preferences / Settings menu. No opacity, no prompt color. This is not a console. This is nothing!
It is indeed a terminal emulator, no features though...

It's simple and fast, doesn't have that many options. The lesser number of options is a pro and a con. I like the app overall, it has kinetic scroll which is missing from the default Terminal app i.e. gnome-terminal. It's overall a good app but folks who prefer to tweak things would have a hard time adjusting to this.
can someone please help me!
summary: i can open it on my virtual box

description: Works as intended. The title bar changing color for sudo/ssh is a nice touch. I have no use for fancy settings to alter my terminal colors, etc. so this works great for me.
Gets the job done and looks nice too.
No fullscreen, no transparency, no preferences.
Better than gnome terminal
does not get in your way. A simple and lean terminal emulator for casual users.
I can't even change the cursor style anymore? No dark window without making the title bar inconsistent with the light theme? No settings at all? REALLY? This is worse than the old Terminal app.
It does what a Terminal Emulator should do, but it's got no customization. Everything is based on the GNOME Shell, down to the font.
summary: It works, but can't be customized :/

description: honestly liked the gnome-terminal better but this does do the job for now

I don't do a lot of theming to my desktop so that doesn't seem like a downside to me. When I first used it on Ubuntu it didn't look right but since I switched to Fedora this terminal app seems like the better option. I'm excited to see where future updates take this modern appoach to a terminal app.
it works as a terminal, but has basically no customization. Use the older GNOME terminal or a better terminal app instead. Konsole is probably the best alternative for ultra customization.
summary: Seems to be in the very early stages

description: multiple windws

+ UI style/design aligns with latest GNOME making it feet
+ slightly faster?

- this could have been an update to Gnome terminal 2.0
- no customization... Imagine wanting another theme or needing higher contrast...
- no background transparency
- no split windows (so that regular users wouldn't need tmux or others...)
- still no modern line editing controls like in Warp terminal, for example
- no way to customize shortcuts
- no way to set up initial terminal size
- find window: "Enter" doesn't move to next found item
- no way to change the font
- no way to change cursor style
- no way to configure scrollback buffer
- we are in 2024. We all learned to use advanced editing tools, things like multiline editing, regex in search, what good UX is. But as always, this looks like yet another hegemonical, missed GNOME idea made without understanding who their audience actually is...

Basically it's a glorified text input that shows it's text that happens to be a terminal in it's predefined way... I recommend using Warp even though it's in alpha instead...
summary: It's not minimal. It's barebones. Waste of time developing it..

description: Vielleicht verstehe ich ja sogar noch warum der gnome Texteditor ein wenig simpler gestaltet wurde als gedit, wobei auch das schon grenzwertig war. Aber gnome Terminal? Es gibt keinen Grund ein Terminal für Leihen verständlicher zu machen, wer sich so gut mit linux auskennt das er ein Terminal verwendet, der will das auch anpassen können. Und so wie es gerade aussieht ist das hier nicht der Fall. Entweder man ist mit dem Produkt 100% zufrieden wie es kommt, oder es ist ungeeignet.

... el blanco sobre negro que se supone
en modo oscuro (mejor para a vista) que 
lo que se muestra por defecto. Además si
ocupa menos, chances are that - bloatware.

Cheers.
summary: Tiene el fondo más negro que

description: Consola pretende reemplazar en un futuro a Terminal de Gnome. Estoy usando Consola en su versión 43 y aún es extremadamente sencilla, espero siga mejorando. De todas maneras me ha funcionado muy bien.
Está yendo en la direccion correcta pero, por favor, agréguenle la funcionalidad de tiling.
summary: Está yendo en la dirección correcta

description: Très fonctionnel et cohérent avec l'environnement Gnome, mais je n'ai pas trouvé de menu permettant de personnaliser les couleurs du texte/fond.
Pour l'instant je l'installe, mais c'est cool
Очень понравилось. Стилистически выдержанное, при руте цвет заголовка говорит об этом.
Но не хватает некоторых настроек
Ещебы добавили настройки.

Настройки тут как всегда у разрабов гнома - спартанские, только шрифт и сигналы, как звуковые, так и на заголовке. Вкладки есть, поиск есть. Несмотря на количество настроек, этот чуть лучше, чем Чёрный Ящик, потому что лучше интегрирован в GNOME (GTK4 и libadwaita). Но если сейчас был бы ещё GNOME 3-ей ветки, то Чёрный Ящик победил бы.

Пожелания разработчикам:
Вернуть все настройки из старого GNOME Terminal.
